item.title: A Beginner's Guide to Makeup for Trans Women
item.description: This blog post is an adaptation and rewrite of some advice I wrote for some trans girls on a discord server.

item.title: How to Self-Administer Medical Injections Sustainably
item.description: This guide is written under the assumption that you are doing Intramuscular rather than Subcutaneous shots; though the vast majority is applicable to both injection methods.

item.title: Injection Checklist and Steps
item.description: Checklist You’ll need the following items; Your vial/bottle/ampoule of medication A syringe A draw needle (around 18g. Optional, but highly recommended) An injection needle (around 23g or 25g) A sharps container (a 2L bottle works fine!

item.title: Setting Up a Personal Site with Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: {{ youtube -LgYzva-xq8 }} Alright, so a friend was asking if I could make a site for them after crafting this one and showing it off.
